description: Get the number of items in the shopping bag, including the current number of items in the shopping bag, the report final at the bottom, etc.

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: Partner API id assigned when registration is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is a timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Obtained unique identifier using it identify your permission to the api, Valid for 90 days and will expire 14 hours

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Request unique identifier for a user

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if has error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if has error. Empty if no error occurred

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: total_item_count
response_fields.description: The number of items in the shopping bag

response_fields.name: max_item_count
response_fields.description: The maximum number of items allowed in the shopping bag at the bottom
